Upon hearing about Yoketron, Straight Shot freezes.  Her expressions change=
 dramatically, as she turns to Leo Prime.

" Dinobot - knew all that time, =
that Master Yoketron was killed?  Why didn't anyone tell us?  Does anyone e=
lse know?  Has anyone even told Nightshift and Tucson?  I'd like ta see Din=
obot gather the courage ta tell Tucson in person what his comrade did ta ou=
r Sensai! "

Quickstride turns to Dinobot in shock.

" I know you preds are=
 bad news, but wow, that really tips the scales, literally."

Rattrap also =
gasps.

" AND YOU THOUGHT WHAT I DID WAS BAD?!  HAH, THAT WAS JUST PAYBACK =
FOR WHAT YOUR COMRADE DID TA THE GREATEST NINJABOT MASTER OF ALL TIME! IF I=
 HAD KNOWN THAT I WOULD NEVER HAVE ADMITTED TA MY MISTAKE!  OHHH ARE YOU IN=
 SERIOUS SCRAP NOW BUDDY!  JUST WAIT UNTIL TUCSON IS NOTIFIED OF THIS! Then=
 again... Ohh boy, Leo, I - think you better be the one ta tell 'em...  Mas=
ter Yoketron was everything ta him, this is gonna really do serious damage =
ta his emotional circuitry."
